text: The 1967 Soviet Class A Second Group was the fifth season of the Soviet Class A Second Group football competitions that was established in 1963. It was also the 27th season of the Soviet second tier league competition. ==First stage== ===First subgroup=== ===Second subgroup=== ===Third subgroup=== ==Final stage== ===For places 1-3=== [Oct 27 – Nov 16] ====Additional Final==== [Nov 21, Tashkent] * Dinamo Kirovabad 1-0 Shakhtyor Karaganda * Dinamo Kirovabad promoted. ===For places 4-6=== [Oct 27 – Nov 16] ==See also== * Soviet First League ==External links== * 1967 season. RSSSF 1967 2 Soviet Soviet
title: 1967 Soviet Class A Second Group
